en: Peppa and her family are going to the museum.
zh: 佩奇和家人去博物馆参观。

en: It's a place full of interesting things that are very old.
zh: 它是一个存放古老又有趣的东西的地方。

en: There is one room full of things that belonged to kings and queens from long ago.
zh: 有间房间放满属于很久以前的国王和王后的东西。

en: I want to see the king and queen's room!
zh: 我想去看看国王和王后的房间！

en: And there's another room with a real dinosaur.
zh: 另外一个房间有真正的恐龙。
两张成人票和二张儿童票。

en: Peppa wants to see the room full of things that belong to kings and queens from long ago.
zh: 佩奇想去看放满很久以前的国王和王后的东西的房间。

en: But George wants to see the real dinosaur.
zh: 但是乔治想去看真正的恐龙。

en: We will see the dinosaur next.
zh: 我们接着会去看恐龙的。

en: Peppa, these are all the things that the queen had a long time ago.
zh: 佩奇，这些东西都是很久以前国王和王后所拥有的。

en: This is the queen's special chair.
Look, Peppa. This is the queen's golden crown.
zh: 看，佩奇，这是王后的金色皇冠。

en: Mummy, where is the queen's television?
zh: 妈妈，王后的电视机放在哪？

en: No, they didn't have computers, either.
What did they do all day?
Mummy, if I was the queen, I would eat as much cake as I wanted.
zh: 妈妈，如果我是王后，我想吃多少蛋糕就吃多少。
佩奇想像成为一个王后。

en: Is there anything else you would care for, Queen Peppa?
zh: 你有什么你还想要的吗，佩奇王后？

en: You must bow when you speak to me.
zh: 你跟我说话时必须要鞠躬。

en: Oh! I'm most terribly sorry,your royal highness.
zh: 哦！我深感抱歉，王后陛下。

en: Hmmm, that must be very interesting.
George! This is the dinosaur room!
I can't see him. He must be very small.
zh: 我看不到他。他一定非常小了。

en: These are the bones of a real dinosaur.
zh: 这些都是真恐龙的骨头。

en: George imagines being a big dinosaur.
zh: 乔治想像变成一条大恐龙。

en: The dinosaur room is George's favorite room!
zh: 这间恐龙屋是乔治最喜欢的房间！

en: My favorite room is the king and queen's room.
zh: 我最喜欢的是国王和王后的房间。

en: And it looks as if Daddy Pig is already in his favorite room.
zh: 看来爸爸好像已经到了他最喜欢的房间了。

en: The room with the cakes in.
Daddy Pig's favorite room is the museum cafe.
zh: 猪爸爸最爱的房间是博物馆的餐厅。

en: Oh, yes! This is a very nice room!
zh: 哦，是的！这真是最好的房间！
